name: Pixel Adventure (itch)
description:
This is just pre-alpha version. Please tell me your opinion, ideas and bug reports in the comments.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD 
  • Press Space to dash
  • Pickup items when you are near them with Left mouse button and drag them to inventory slots
  • If you have sword in inventory you can attack with Right mouse Button
  • Touch a heal potion to drink it
